mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ranking (author, board, rating, views, likes) VALUES (#{author}, #{board}, #{rating}, #{views}, #{likes})
mapper.select: SELECT rank, author, board, rating, views, likes FROM ranking ORDER BY likes DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE ranking SET author = #{author}, board = #{board}, rating = #{rating}, views = #{views}, likes = #{likes} WHERE rank = #{rank}
mapper.select: SELECT rank, author, board, rating, views, likes FROM ranking ORDER BY likes DESC LIMIT 10
